queries.clientAvails: select timestamp as x, round(sum(status)*100/count(status)) as y0, group_concat(case when status=0 then logid end) as info0 from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to group by round(strftime('%s',timestamp)/$timeStep)
queries.clientAvailsBanner: select cast(sum(status) as float)*100/count(status) as percent from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to
queries.clientAvailsPie: select sum(status) as y1, count(status) - sum(status) as y0, group_concat(case when status=0 then logid end) as info0, $none as info1 from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to
